author: n0price
content: On this article it shows that is possible to set custom MAX_EFFECTIVE_BALANCE https://ethereum2077.substack.com/i/140556227/permitting-validators-to-set-custom-ceilings-for-maxeffectivebalance, and it will be an issue if it's not possible, because you will receive the CL rewards only when MAX_EFFECTIVE_BALANCE  crosses 2048 ETH, and this is not the case for most of stakers.

author: m.kalinin
content: It will be possible to withdraw a portion of balance of 0x02 validator that exceeds 32 ETH upon request from EL (EIP-7002)

author: m.kalinin
content: yes, tx fee + request fee, the latter can be as low as 1 wei during the time of no requests demand

author: n0price
content: I checked, how can you withdraw the balance that exceeds 32 ETH when you are using the windraw address 0x02 that support MaxEB, EIP-7002 supports 0x01 ?

author: m.kalinin
content: ah, yes. it needs to be updated

author: m.kalinin
content: here is the spec for CL function which processes the request: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/electra/beacon-chain.md#new-process_withdrawal_request
